name: directory-hash
description: Do stuff with file system directory trees most often involving hashes - integrity checking, merging, etc.

scripts.test: tmux set-window-option -t test window-status-style 'bg=yellow' && jshint --config test/.jshintrc --reporter unix test && jscs --config .jscsrc --es3 --no-colors --reporter unix test && jshint --config lib/.jshintrc --reporter unix lib && jscs --config .jscsrc --es3 --no-colors --reporter unix lib && mocha --async-only --no-colors --reporter spec --sort --bail --ui bdd --check-leaks --full-trace --inline-diffs --no-exit --recursive --require main-test.js && tmux set-window-option -t test window-status-style 'bg=green';E=$?;[ "$E" != "0" ] && tmux set-window-option -t test window-status-style 'bg=red';exit $E

author: Vytautas Jakutis <vytautas@jakut.is> (https://jakut.is)
